website_summaries.verdict: This is a great budget bag for beginners that holds up well over time, but more experienced players with multiple racquets may want something roomier.
pros: This bag can hold up to tennis racquets, and it’s available in two fun colors
There are two external pockets, one of which is felt-lined to hold sunglasses, phones, and other breakable items
Users are pleased with the bag’s durability, especially at this price point, and if you do run into issues, you can get your money back thanks to the manufacturer’s satisfaction guarantee
It has an adjustable shoulder strap and a grab handle for easy carrying
cons: Some users say it’s really only large enough for two racquets, so it may not be the right fit if you want a bag to carry all of your gear

customer_reviews.title: People see what they want to see.
customer_reviews.text: Needed to add some Internal padding to fill out the shape, it now looks like expected. Just a sports bag, urban camouflage to stop any panic attacks.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag looks fine but the space is quite limited. The manufacturer claims it will fit three rackets, and it does only if you push and cramp them in leaving no space for anything else, like a towel or extra clothing. It is really a two racket bag. Side pockets are ok for sweat bands and your phone and keys but not for a tennis ball can. I was disappointed overall.
customer_reviews.author: EW

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this tennis bag because it was advertised to hold 3 rackets. I wasn’t able to get even my one over sized racket in the bag and when I tried to put two of my standard sized rackets, I couldn’t get the zipper to close. I returned it to Amazon and had to pay $5.99 to ship it back. I am disappointed in Amazon for having a vendor that lies about their product.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen Reider

customer_reviews.title: Best value
customer_reviews.text: Yes it's just a slight bit skinny to fit balls in here too but fits two adult rackets and one child racket just fine. Based on the price I'm giving 5 stars even though I would love a piece of material to separate the rackets.
customer_reviews.author: MiyaPens

customer_reviews.title: Great bag at a great price!
customer_reviews.text: Nice durable bag and with slight modifications, makes a great carrying bag for my AR-15 when the upper and lower receivers are separated! Zipper pockets hold my magazines! Looks like just a tennis bag in the back of the car instead of a gun bag!
customer_reviews.author: Bunky

customer_reviews.title: Shop around and see whats out there
customer_reviews.text: The bag was very lightweight and thin ply material enough to be folded easily in the package. I just got it but it doesn’t look like the construction is particularly sturdy or durable. The Head TI s6 racket I bought with it barely fits into this bag. I think it would have been nice if they made the bag an inch or two longer. Another thing would have been great is if they had put some method to hold a tennis ball container or two or maybe just the tennis balls without the container.
customer_reviews.author: marcus

customer_reviews.title: Great value racquet bag
customer_reviews.text: Really liking this bag so far. I only have two racquets so there is plenty of room. Main pouch can easily hold two adult-sized racquets, an extra shirt, a pair of socks, and a bottle of water. The larger front side pouch can hold six tennis balls (removed from cans) and there is a soft-lined smaller pocket for phone, keys, valuables. Handle and shoulder strap feel well attached and the bag seems durable. Happy with the value at this price.
customer_reviews.author: bb3613

customer_reviews.title: Great bang for buck.
customer_reviews.text: This is great so far. Especially at this price. I love the little pocket for my keys and phone. Then the larger side pocket for balls. I fit 2 rackets in the main compartment. Simple, light, and just what i wanted.
customer_reviews.author: nona

customer_reviews.title: Great bag.
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Nice looking. Very durable. Good size. Easy to carry. My daughter only needs to carry one racquet, so this bag is big enough to also hold her tennis shoes and tennis clothes. 2 extra pockets on sides. One big enough to hold her sunscreen and a snack. The other just big enough to hold her phone. Perfect for after school tennis.
customer_reviews.author: amy

customer_reviews.title: Excellent fit for a racquet with a 10.5 inch barrel
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fir for an AR pistol with a 10.5 inch barrel and a shockwave brace. I don't know about the long term durability yet, but I love the colour and the look.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I love it!  It holds a whole lot of tennis stuff!
customer_reviews.text: You can definitely put 3 rackets in the bag, maybe even 4. I was able to put three rackets and two towels in the large part and still had room for more. I was able to put 6 tennis balls in the large side pocket and various other things in the other smaller side pocket. It is a very handy way to carry a lot of stuff that I need when I'm playing tennis. I would recommend this to anyone that plays tennis and is looking for a bag.
customer_reviews.author: JoMillr

customer_reviews.title: not to bad of a  bag
customer_reviews.text: sons original bag was falling apart so we needed a cheap but reliable bag to hold his tennis stuff. this bag worked out great. 1 racked and will leave enough room for his shoes and clothes but just barely he was disappointed it was not as roomy as it seemed but it gets the job done and keeps him comfortable with a backpack during the day.
customer_reviews.author: sue sutton

customer_reviews.title: ★★★★★
customer_reviews.text: ★★★★★ I have two racquets and they both fit inside the big pocket. I also put a tennis ball can, towels, and some clothes. I'd say this bag does the job well. It would be hard to fit the extra stuff if you had 3 racquets in the bag. It does not look like it is made from strongest material possible, but I'd say for the price and the extra pockets, 5 stars!!! ★★★★★
customer_reviews.author: P51

customer_reviews.title: Great spacious tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: This tennis bag states that it was for 2 rackets, yet I was able to fit in 4 without any trouble. I was also able to fit a tube of 10 Badminton Shuttlecocks. I really like the two extra pockets it came with. Placed 4 towels in one and two cellphones and a wallet in the other. So far it seems great with no issues.
customer_reviews.author: Lourdes Guzman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for Raquetball
customer_reviews.text: Very pleasantly surprised with the quality of the materials for the price. Can fit 3 Raquetball racquets easily and possibly 4. I use the extra space for a ball can and clothes. The pockets are perfect for clean sweet bands. Can easily attach the gloves and elbow band with safety glasses attached to shoulder strap. Does not fit tennis shoes but I prefer to keep those outside in my trunk and change shoes outside of gym. This is Perfect size bag for me. My gearbox tournament bag was just too big for everyday use and took up too much space in my trunk.
customer_reviews.author: Sara

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and thoughtfully designed
customer_reviews.text: I bought the Athletico tennis bad after having used their skate bags for the last few seasons. I’ve found the skate bags to be durable and well designed, as well as very affordable priced, and they have held up well. The tennis racket bag appears to be similarly well designed, with several accessory pockets that hold several cans of balls. I look forward to the same quality as we’ve experienced with the skate bags.
customer_reviews.author: TPH

customer_reviews.title: The size was just a bit small
customer_reviews.text: The bag looked nice but it could be a bit larger to fit three racquets because I really had to stuff my three racquets into it and I was afraid to rip it open.
customer_reviews.author: elam

customer_reviews.title: Smaller Than You Think
customer_reviews.text: It just barely holds two racquets. The side pocket holds only one can of balls. No room exists for other items such as water bottle, safety glasses, bug spray, gloves, sweatshirt, towel , visor, arm support etc. The strap is not removable.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good small racket bag
customer_reviews.text: No way can 3 rackets fit in this bag. 2 110” rackets barely fit in after trying to force them. No room left for more than 2 loose balls and 1 car key. LOL. Great for squash or badminton IMO. Courts were closed due to Covid and didn’t realize how small bag was until 30 day return period ended. Hoping seller can help? Maybe review will improve with a better taste in my mouth.!
customer_reviews.author: Fed’s Army

customer_reviews.title: Nice Tennis Bag
customer_reviews.text: It holds two tennis racquets, a small water bottle and some balls with some room for a change of light clothing (no shoes), keys, phone. Or 3 racquets with room for keys and a phone. Nice quality, easy carrying, not bulky. I'm glad I bought it over a more expensive option.
customer_reviews.author: Alexandra

customer_reviews.title: Great value and perfect size.
customer_reviews.text: Great basic racket carrying case. It has a pocket for my things and can hold my other tennis equipment with ease
customer_reviews.author: Elaine L.

customer_reviews.title: Works great for our rackets
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to carry our 2 rackets. If feels rugged enough and fits our rackets nicely. We can fit 2 packs of 3 balls, 2 rackets, and 2 sets of wrist/head sweatbands and a couple of small towels. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: DenAlex89

customer_reviews.title: Cheap and Good, Does the Job Right
customer_reviews.text: This tennis bag manages to fit my tennis racquet and my racquetball racquet smoothly. The two pockets on both sides allows me to keep a variety of items that I wouldn't want to have in my pockets while playing. I have yet to try fitting three racquets in here but It seems like there should be space to do so. Overall great product for the price, nabbed me compliments from my friends who have much more expensive bags.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: It was a tight fit for my raquet
customer_reviews.text: The bag was too small and didn't fit two full size raquets. If you are looking for a smaller bag, this might be your product, but its hard to believe this will hold 3 raquets.
customer_reviews.author: HSB

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This tennis bag is as advertised. Love the small pocket where I can keep my car key/wallet/phone and zip it up. I only have 2 rackets and they fit in the bag nicely. No complaints here!
customer_reviews.author: PeppyC0LA

customer_reviews.title: Simple and awesome tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I needed. A tennis bag, not too big or small, that can fit at least 2 racquets, few balls, and personal items such as phone, wallet, keys. Bag has couple of pockets for all that. Lightweight and material feels durable. Adjustable strap for wearing.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Looks good and feels good. X95 fits.
customer_reviews.text: Like: Looks good and is lightweight. Light padding on sides. Dislike: edges, top and bottom do not have padding. (Sides are padded but bottomed and side are not.) This is a minor thing for me as I have spare foam. FYI: Dimensions say it is 27.75 inches long. My IWI X95 measures 27". It does fit, INCLUDING the red dot. *May not fit if you swap the muzzle device. My factory birdcage fits fine but not much room left over.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Holds 2 cans of 3 balls (6 balls total) in large pocket!
customer_reviews.text: Just received bag. Fantastic! Very roomy. You can fit a can of 3 balls And a water bottle in the large zippered compartment. Or 2 cans of 3 balls fit too. I wasn't expecting it to be this roomy! The strap is very comfortable. Great bag!
customer_reviews.author: C Roth

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag
customer_reviews.text: Seems to be pretty tough for as light as it is. Zipper runs nice and smooth, and the small pocket is good for holding my phone, wallet, etc. I would buy another one.
customer_reviews.author: R. Luckhart

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag!
customer_reviews.text: We just purchased this product. The bag seems very roomy without being large. The material is very sturdy and the stitching appears to very well done. The bag is padded which is great for children tennis players (who just throw there bags without a care) and their rackets. We also loved the pockets. So far, we are very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Kriska

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and durable racket case
customer_reviews.text: This is a great tennis bag. I love the color, of course, pink. I use it for my rackets for racquetball, Pickle ball and tennis. And it fits all three. I would definitely order this again.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen  McCoy

customer_reviews.title: Nice, Functional
customer_reviews.text: Very functional and lightweight bag that fits 2 of my adult tennis racquets, no problem. Have not tried to put 3, as advertised, but I imagine it wouldn't be a problem,
customer_reviews.author: K. W.

customer_reviews.title: A modest little bag that is all it claims to be
customer_reviews.text: It handles the 3 rackets and is easy to zip. One hand carry-strap vs two. Easily slung over the shoulder with the shoulder strap. Seems worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: Artee

customer_reviews.title: Good bang for the buck
customer_reviews.text: Even though description says holds 3 racquets, I could get no more than 2 in and get it zipped. Side pocket for “balls” is too small for a can of balls but would hold several loose balls. The two outside zipper pockets are a plus. All in all, a very nice bag for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Excellent quality. Perfectly fit 2 Adult tennis rockets and 1 Child . There is pocket in the front to put the balls and also pocket on the back for your personal items, phone etc. I love this product and will buy again for my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Revival Express Inc

customer_reviews.title: Tennis Bag Size
customer_reviews.text: I am somewhat disappointed - says 3 racquets but 2 are best - and not really much space for the misc.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph J Hill

customer_reviews.title: You don’t need no other, this does the job.
customer_reviews.text: The bag fits three rackets perfectly as described. I specifically liked the liner on the interior which helps to protect the rackets. There are two other areas to store balls and keys etc. I truly love this product.
customer_reviews.author: Keith Gilkes

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and padded
customer_reviews.text: Great product compared to my old tennis bag that was worn and heavy. Liked the extra pockets and ease of acessability. The bag could be a little longer as my two rackets needed a squeeze fit.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Quality, cost, and size
customer_reviews.text: Was looking for a bag that wasn't huge or all branded up. Only needed space for a racket of two, can of balls, and a separate pocket for phone & keys. This bag seems to fit the bill. Like the fabric and hoping the zippers hold up (they look and feel sturdy). Shipped quickly and Athletico's team politely followed up to make sure I was happy. I am.
customer_reviews.author: Mark Sternal

customer_reviews.title: Light weight, but smaller than expected
customer_reviews.text: Definitely light weight, seems well constructed. However, claims that it holds 3 rackets are an exaggeration. I struggle to get two in. Also, find I have to carry extra balls separately.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: My daughter loves this bag! It holds her raquet ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this bag! It holds her raquet, tennis uniform and phone perfectly while the padding adds protection in the locker room.
customer_reviews.author: sturgeon1603

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: This tennis bag is lightweight and compact, but you can easily fit 3 adult rackets, and many of your other stuff (phone, wallet, keys, snacks,) in the 2 external pockets. You might not be able to fit ball cans with the 3 rackets tho. But you can definitely fit them with 2.
customer_reviews.author: Mohamad M

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: This was very reasonably priced. Very light weight. I also like that it has 2 zippered pockets that I can keep money and my phone and ear buds in.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Magelowitz

customer_reviews.title: Great case at a good price. Durable for daily use.
customer_reviews.text: Store three rackets in it and it works well. Durable for daily use and deep pocket to store accessories. A good case at a very reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Hunter

customer_reviews.title: Good quality.
customer_reviews.text: Actually I was surprised at how nice the quality of this bag. Just as nice as the pricey bags at sporting good stores. Easily holds 2 rackets and extra side pockets are nice for junk.
customer_reviews.author: Yvonne

customer_reviews.title: Too Small
customer_reviews.text: I had difficulty getting two rackets into it. Even with just one racket, there was little room for balls, water bottle, etc
customer_reviews.author: Paul Langevin

customer_reviews.title: Nice for the price!
customer_reviews.text: Looks sleek and new -- same as the Wilson bag I saw (Minus the logo). Pockets for balls/keys/wallets are fine. It's a little tight on space, but that's not a huge deal for us. My wife is very happy with it :)
customer_reviews.author: Play It Again Zam

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my needs
customer_reviews.text: This bag is perfect for my needs. Obviously, my racket fits perfectly. A canister of balls, keys, wallet, and cell phone all fit nicely too.
customer_reviews.author: David A. Hanson

customer_reviews.title: Athletico Tennis Bag
customer_reviews.text: I liked this product because it is lightweight and has enough room for cell phone, a can of tennis balls, bottled water and my tennis racquet and any other small items I need. The tennis bag arrived on time also. The quality of the bag is fine for the price I paid and I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Curreri

customer_reviews.title: Good for price
customer_reviews.text: Very good, fits two 27” racquets very well and little bit of room is left. Not sure if it will fit 3rd racquet though. Big pocket fits 11 balls.
customer_reviews.author: Sofia

customer_reviews.title: Great cover!!
customer_reviews.text: Work well to carry my SBR and does not draw attention when carrying.
customer_reviews.author: Linda LeCroy

customer_reviews.title: the bag is made well good zippers and material
customer_reviews.text: Love the make up of this bag good zippers good material.My only criticism is 3 rackets do not fit well.2 rackets great!
customer_reviews.author: hunter Cain

customer_reviews.title: Great bag, for a great price.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great racquet bag. It offers a bit of padding for the racquets and two separate pockets for other belongings, such as phones, wallets, or balls. I like the adjustable shoulder strap and the overall look and feel of the bag.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Fits the bill
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the bag for a few days, but fits two adult rackets comfortably and has plenty of room for balls, sweat bands, phone, wallet and keys.
customer_reviews.author: Frank J D'Orsi, Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Great value, looks good and is durable
customer_reviews.text: It's been a few months now and this good looking bag has survived through a lot of use. Great value and can hold 2 racquets easily along with water bottle, tennis balls and accessories.
customer_reviews.author: S Kapoor

customer_reviews.title: Great Value
customer_reviews.text: Great 3 racquet bag, room for sun block and balls
customer_reviews.author: David Zuckerman

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bag looks great and working very good. Loving my bag.
customer_reviews.author: Nix

customer_reviews.title: Great tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: We love this tennis bag! It fits 2 rackets, 2 cans of balls (even in their cans), plus a phone and keys. It’s easy to carry and a good material as well. We’re glad we bought this one as it seems good quality and wasn’t as expensive as other ones we were looking at!
customer_reviews.author: Alicia Goodwin

customer_reviews.title: Bag capacity
customer_reviews.text: This racquet bag holds three rackets, although it's kind of a snug fit. It's lightweight and comfortable on my shoulder.
customer_reviews.author: DiFi

customer_reviews.title: Good looking bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a tennis bag. Looks good, roomy, padded. Will fit 2-3 racquets, 2 pockets for a can of balls each or other small gear. Was the best value I found without sacrificing quality. I would buy it again.
customer_reviews.author: Matt Senecal

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price
customer_reviews.text: Overall great product for the price, it fits our Rackets very well and has a nice carrying strap, I only wish there was a liner inbetween to separate the rackets from touching. Good buy happy with my purchase would recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Hkett

customer_reviews.title: Tennis Racquet Bag
customer_reviews.text: It's a great product at a great price. I purchased it for a beginner player so he might better protect and carry his equipment. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this bag for my son. He is playing tennis for the first time this bag is perfect for his needs. Sturdy, good quality and a great price.
customer_reviews.author: sharon eggers

customer_reviews.title: Good, Dependable Raquet Bag
customer_reviews.text: This is a good bag for a beginner or someone getting back into tennis, such as myself. It holds my racquet plus 3 cans of tennis balls with no problems. There are pockets for my keys and cell phone which is good when I'm on the court. Would highly recommend this racquet bag!
customer_reviews.author: Guitar Dad

customer_reviews.title: Not 3 racquet bag.
customer_reviews.text: Had to return, does not hold 3 racquets, could not even fit 2.
customer_reviews.author: Cj

customer_reviews.title: Perfectly designed.
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of space for a couple of racquets, plus a separate pocket for balls and another one for my keys.
customer_reviews.author: JIB

customer_reviews.title: Fits more than one racket and has pockets for phone, keys, etc.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for my son for tennis team. It’s perfect! He loves it. Roomy enough for 2-3 rackets. Storage pockets for personal effects. Comfortable to carry.
customer_reviews.author: ShannonL

customer_reviews.title: Great racket carry bag
customer_reviews.text: Slim, easy to use, and fits up to 2 rackets.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag, fits two racquets and multiple balls. Also has a sister pocket for my phone, which is very convenient!
customer_reviews.author: Veronika

customer_reviews.title: LOVE this!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the best tennis bag I’ve ever had. Great quality, stylish and functional with ample space
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I wanted!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this for our 12 year old grandson who has been taking tennis lessons. It was perfect! Sturdy, but lightweight with lots of pockets for storage. Would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty nice
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. Haven’t had a chance to really play but the material is good and I don’t have to shove my rackets in like my old bag
customer_reviews.author: Tanya

customer_reviews.title: Very pleased
customer_reviews.text: Fits three racquets perfectly. Extra pockets for phone and money or keys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's nice!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my beginning high school tennis player. It can definitely fit two rackets comfortably, and it has room for her tennis outfit, visor, keys, and ID. She loves it! The color is vibrant, and it is tough enough to do the job.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Chapman

customer_reviews.title: Great Bag at a Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my daughter. It seems to be well made and she likes it a lot. Great price too!
customer_reviews.author: Jules

customer_reviews.title: Exceeded Expectations
customer_reviews.text: This bag is even better than described. Light, well made and roomy.
customer_reviews.author: Len M

customer_reviews.title: Well Built
customer_reviews.text: Really good bag if you are looking for something not too big that has space for 2-3 rackets and pockets for a cell phone, wallet etc. Solid construction. Great price. Simple design. I would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: shapstik

customer_reviews.title: Athletico tennis bag.
customer_reviews.text: It's a little on the small side so I put two racquets in there with some balls and a small towell. Then I put all my little stuff in the two outside pockets. Love it. Lightweight and the quality seems great for the price point.
customer_reviews.author: Marshall

customer_reviews.title: Good Case For The Money
customer_reviews.text: Good case for the money. I bought it to carry ONE tennis racket. It can probably hold TWO. I think THREE is pushing it.
customer_reviews.author: DayTripper

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: It is wonderful. Quality is good and looks perfect. And, it delivered so fast!!! Good job. Hopes better and better.
customer_reviews.author: princeliebe

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality for the money. Fits our two adult racquets and one kid's racquet comfortably. Extra pockets are nice; one is big enough to carry 3 loose balls (without the can).
customer_reviews.author: T.S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice looking and functional.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking and functional bag for our two new rackets.
customer_reviews.author: Tim K

customer_reviews.title: A bit too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small. Just holds a racquet and a kickball paddle comfortably. No space for a can of balls. The side pocket is ok but also not big enough.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Weston

customer_reviews.title: Just What I Needed
customer_reviews.text: This tennis bag is just what I needed to store my three rackets. The side pocket is useful for a few balls.
customer_reviews.author: Butchie

customer_reviews.title: Quality product.
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my 13-yr old daughter. It’s a quality product and serves her need.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag
customer_reviews.text: It works very well, is the correct size and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Borkowski

customer_reviews.title: Does what it's supposed to
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag to carry 3 tennis rackets in; two adult sized and one child sized racket. All three fit. The bag seems well made and like it will hold up to our casual weekly tennis game.
customer_reviews.author: KMac

customer_reviews.title: Too small
customer_reviews.text: Too small !!! The racquets "barely" fit and the zippered pocket on the side wouldn't even accept a can of balls. I returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Cath/Bill

customer_reviews.title: Barely enough room. Good for simple storage.
customer_reviews.text: Good for two racquet. Barely for 3. Pocket has very little space. Barely enough for 2 or 3 balls. Not padded enough. Ok product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!!!
customer_reviews.text: The bag is actually better than I expected, it has lots of room and the side pockets are very handy
customer_reviews.author: Hector Marroquin

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great bag. Pockets could be a little bigger. Over all good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: C K Rinaldi

customer_reviews.title: ... very light and convenient for 3 tennis racquets very happy with the
customer_reviews.text: Athletica is very light and convenient for 3 tennis racquets very happy with the choice
customer_reviews.author: srinipeela

customer_reviews.title: Very basic tennis racquet bag
customer_reviews.text: The bag is fine for my 2 racquets. As most of the reviews acknowledge, there isn't room for a 3rd racquet.
customer_reviews.author: BAW

customer_reviews.title: Very good product.
customer_reviews.text: Serves the purpose fully. And its as good as major brands. So i would go for this one. Value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Racket bag
customer_reviews.text: Looks well-made and lightweight. Space for three-rackets and a can of balls is tight. Would have been nice if it were slightly bigger, maybe one more small compartment for stuff. Overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Saviano

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, easily holds multi rackets, balls and rags, headbands, etc. Nice wide well constructed strap for carrying. My son takes it to school everyday for tennis practice and it holds up really well.
customer_reviews.author: LoveBooks

customer_reviews.title: Tennis bag
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my grandson and he loved it.
customer_reviews.author: angeleyes

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy bag
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, loved the product overall, fits in both if my rackets snugly, U wish it was enough roomy to pkace the balls inside too.
customer_reviews.author: Syed Alam

customer_reviews.title: Great bag!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this bag! Hold everything in place and easy to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth A Worley

customer_reviews.title: Super average
customer_reviews.text: Just meh... nothing great to say for sure, nothing really bad to say either though, just meh
customer_reviews.author: Scott K

product_meta.title: Athletico 3 Racquet Tennis Bag | Padded to Protect Rackets & Lightweight | Professional or Beginner Tennis Players | Unisex Design for Men, Women, Youth and Adults
feature_bullets: STORES UP TO 3 TENNIS RACKETS AND BALLS - This tennis bag is sized to accommodate up to 3 tennis rackets and is padded to protect them.

EXTERNAL POCKETS FOR BALL, PHONE, AND KEY STORAGE - A large outside pocket is large enough to hold a canister of tennis balls. The smaller, felt lined pocket can be used to hold a phone, keys, and other small accessories.
CARRY IT YOUR WAY - This bag comes with both a padded shoulder strap and tote handle. So you can carry it your way - over the shoulder or as a hand tote.
EASY ON YOUR WALLET BUT BUILT TO LAST - We engineered our tennis tote bag to be cheap in price, but not in quality. Constructed of durable 600D polyester fabric that is meant to last.
100% SATISFACTION GUARANTEED OR YOUR MONEY BACK - We believe highly in the quality of our tennis bags. If you are unsatisfied with your purchase for any reason, we offer a 100% money back guarantee!
